name: Nocturn Castle Gate
description: The three of you have walked out of the woods into a gravel pathway, with a gateway and some hedges blocking the part forward. Guards are to the north, standing under the moonlit shadows of Castle Nocturn. This is the debug room, whose combat tutorial is battlewarden, or moving north.

door.message: It's the cell door. It looks sturdy.

dialoguetest.name: Rex
dialoguetest.message: He is staring at you, smirking.

statue.message: A bronze statue of a tall, muscular man pointing skyward

signpost.message: North: Old Castle Nocturn, West: To mountains, South: To Taliaport, East: To Nocturn Forest Trail

name: Prison Corridor
description: You step over the bodies of the guards and into the prison block hallway.

chest.message: A wooden chest sits in the corner.

cabinet.message: A medical cabinet on the wall.
